tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geothermal_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    pressure FLOAT NOT NULL,
    production_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE geothermal_reservoir_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    pressure FLOAT,
    production_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_extraction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservoir_id INT,
    extraction_date TIMESTAMP,
    extracted_energy FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (reservoir_id) REFERENCES geothermal_reservoir_data(id)
)

CREATE TABLE reservoir_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature FLOAT,
  pressure FLOAT,
  production_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE temperature_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES reservoir_data(id)
)

CREATE TABLE pressure_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location_id INT,
  pressure FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES reservoir_data(id)
)

CREATE TABLE production_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location_id INT,
  production_rate FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES reservoir_data(id)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_extraction (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  energy_extracted FLOAT,
  energy_efficiency FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES reservoir_data(id)
)
